channel.title: Documentations on floki
channel.description: Recent content in Documentations on floki

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Installation Precompiled binaries can be downloaded from the releases page (for linux (statically linked) and OSX). To obtain curl and extract the latest linux binary directly in your shell, run $ curl -L https://github.com/Metaswitch/floki/releases/download/0.1.0/floki-0.1.0-linux.tar.gz | tar xzvf - You should be able to run floki from your working directory: $ ./floki --version floki 0.1.0 Move it onto your path to run it from anywhere. E.g. # mv floki /usr/local/bin/ Enjoy!
